version_description:
Ahoy there!

First of all, thank you all for helping us to make the app better!
Second, we have a cute corgi employee in the office now. That's why working on the new scenes takes a bit longer. We just can't help giving a good boi his belly rubs.

Ahoy there!
First of all, thank you all for helping us to make the app better!
Second, we have a cute corgi employee in the office now. That's why working on the new scenes takes a bit longer. We just can't help giving a good boi his belly rubs.

Hey guys,
It’s been a while since we shared any cool stuff with you because our Chief ‘Cool-Stuff’ Officer went on holidays. Now everyone’s back in the office (including our corgi employee) and we’re pleased to announce 10 majestic sleep journeys to t

Guys,

Hands down, it's our best update so far. We decided to announce it on October, 10th because it'd been unanimously rated 10/10 here in our office (yeah, pun intended). Explore our 4 new magnificent dioramas followed by the calming sleep tales

Happy Updateday to Loóna. It's 1.3.3 already! Gosh, apps are updating so fast these days.
To mark this special day we decided to announce 3 new mesmerizing dioramas with captivating sleep stories!

Btw, if you have an idea for a diorama, feel fr

We've added shinier bells and whistles to all the dioramas. Because who doesn't like a good update, right?

XOXO,
Loóna

Given the recent events and the growing panic around the world, our team decided to make all the exclusive content available free of charge till the end of April to help you disengage from stressful thoughts, cope with anxiety and fear in the quickest pos

Guys, we've got some good news and some great news.
The good news is that we hired Chief-Great-at-Planning-Updates-Officer. We pinky swear we'll never make you wait that long again.
The great news is that we've added 2 new chapters of absolutely br

Guys, you should definitely check this update as it comes with a magnificent sleepscape series that will take you on an unforgettable bedtime adventure. No spoilers. Click ‘Update’ and see it for yourself.

Also we’d like to thank you for all the fe

This update comes with a few little things that will improve your Loóna experience:

• Improved battery life;
• Integration with HealthKit;
• Improved the 'Hint' button;
• Comfortable pause mode;
• Controllable subtitles.

We're more than happy to proudly announce our new Chapter inspired by childhood memories and times when realms of favorite novels and movies seemed to be as real as the world around us. Download this update and prepare for the most enigmatic and soothing

So... this update comes with 2 new astonishing features. First of all, we're happy to introduce 'Profiles' that will allow you to save your Loóna progress and enjoy the sleepscapes across multiple devices. Pretty cool, huh? Second, it's a totally redesign

Dear family,

Chapter 6 is now officially available! It's time to snuggle up in bed and escape to another world with four dreamlike adventures.
Plus, we added two new exclusive playlists with hand-picked relaxing soundscapes for the right vibe

Dear family,

Chapter 6 is now officially available! It's time to snuggle up in bed and escape to another world with four dreamlike adventures.
Plus, we added two new exclusive playlists with hand-picked relaxing soundscapes for the right vibe

This update comes with a new chapter of four lovely sleepscapes. "What's so special about them?" – you may ask. Well, first, they're really breathtaking. Second, they'll take you to the most endearing places from your past. Third, they're really breathtak
